Headline: Green Line Service Delayed at Cermak
ShortDescription: Green Line trains are standing at Cermak due to an unauthorized person on the tracks. Crews working to restore service.

FullDescription.#cdata-section:
Green Line trains are standing at Cermak due to an unauthorized person on the tracks.

Personnel are working to restore service. Allow extra travel time.

Headline: #73 Armitage Temporary Reroute at Armitage/Central Park
ShortDescription: 73 Armitage buses are temporarily rerouted via Armitage, Pulaski, North Ave, Kimball and Armitage due to, street blockage near Armitage/Central Park.

FullDescription.#cdata-section:
#73 Armitage buses are temporarily rerouted in both directions via Armitage, Pulaski, North Ave, Kimball and Armitage due to, street blockage near Armitage/Central Park.

Allow extra travel time.
